m_szDocTitle: Tesla Shares Surge On Surprise Second-Quarter Profit | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: Tesla Shares Surge On Surprise Second-Quarter Profit August 9th, 2013 by James Ayre   Tesla Motors’ stock (TSLA) continues to climb — after the company reported a surprise second-quarter profit on Wednesday, the stock surged an impressive 13% during premarket trading the following morning. What that means is that the stock rose from about $35 dollars a share at the beginning of the year to about $153 as of the time of me writing this. That is some impressive growth. The pioneering electric vehicle manufacturer reported earnings of 20 cents a share, excluding special items — pretty good conside
